description: 學習單晶片微處理器8051CPU的整體架構，包括RAM、暫存器、計時/計數器、串列介面、中斷方式，進而撰寫控制程式控制硬體應用電路，包括LED閃爍控制、喇叭發音控制、LCD顯示控制、按鍵掃描、光控應用、中斷控制、RS232串列傳輸…等，以便有能力設計小型微處理器應用系統
prerequisites: 具備組合程式撰寫能力

syllabus.zh:
1. ８０５１CPU簡介
2. ８０５１內部結構(RAM、暫存器、中斷)介紹
3. ８０５１計時/計數器介紹
4. ８０５１UART串列介面介紹
5. 實習板製作（Option）
6. LED閃爍控制
7. 喇叭控制實習
8. LCD顯示實習
9. 按鍵掃描實習
10. 光控應用實習
11. 中斷控制實習
12. RS232串列傳輸實習
syllabus.en:
1. Introduction to ８０５１CPU
2. Hardware Summary of MCS-51: Memory Organization、Special Function Registers、I/O Structure
3. Operation of 8051’s Timer/Counter
4. Operation of 8051’s Serial Interface(UART)
5. Accomplishment of Experiment Board
6. LED flash Control Practice
7. Speaker Control Practice
8. LCD Display Control Practice
9. Keyboard Scanned Practice
10. Light-sensor applied Practice
11. Interrupt Control Practice
12. RS232 Serial Transmission Control Practice

weeklySchedule:
Week 1: Course Overview, Formative Assessment (Pre-test)
Week 2: Introduction to Raspberry Pi and Arduino UNO
Week 3: Python Fundamentals for Raspberry Workshop, C/C++ (Arduino IDE) - TinkerCAD Online Simulator
Week 4: Python Fundamentals for Raspberry Pi (Part 1)
Week 5: Python Fundamentals for Raspberry Pi (Part 2)
Week 6: Python Fundamentals for Raspberry Pi (Part 3)
Week 7: Arduino UNO I/O Practice (Part 1) - GPIO
Week 8: Arduino UNO I/O Practice (Part 2) - Serial
Week 9: Midterm Exam/Project
Week 10: Exploring Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) via Tabletop Gaming, An Introduction to University Social Responsibility (USR)
Week 11: Internet of Things (IoT) Final Project, Discussing the Project and Crafting the Proposal
Week 12: Arduino UNO I/O Practice (Part 3) - I2C
Week 13: Raspberry Pi Communication with Arduino UNO via I2C (Part 1)
Week 14: Raspberry Pi Communication with Arduino UNO via I2C (Part 2)
Week 15: Node-Red Basics (Part 1)
Week 16: Node-Red Basics (Part 2)
Week 17: Confirming the Final Project and Refinement
Week 18: Final Project Demonstration and Presentation, Formative Assessment (Post-test)

exams.final: 「微型專題展示」或「上機實作考試」
exams.other: 每個課程單元會有對應的「形成性評量」；微控制器、微處理器實作

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 由製作實習板及撰寫控制程式的訓練，培養設計小型微處理器應用系統之技能。
透過實際動手製作各種硬體應用電路，培養偵錯能力進而建立工程實務能力。
撰寫組合語言控制程式來控制硬體應用電路，增進學生資訊能力。
具備選擇及整合元件，改善單晶片控制電路之能力，並對智慧財產權有所認知。
撰寫實習報告及課堂中提問，培養學生撰寫技術報 告及口頭表達能力。
